mapper.select: select live_num from company_live_static_detail where live_num = (select max(live_num) from company_live_static_detail group by live_num) and company_id = #{companyId} and live_date = #{date} order by live_num desc limit 0,1

select DISTINCT clsr.id,clsr.live_date,clsr.in_time,clsr.out_time,clsr.watch_type,uf.mobile,uf.username,uf.nick_name,s.`name`,s.email,e.lesson_name,d.`item_value` as edu_area,d1.`item_value` as edu_school,d2.`item_value` as edu_step,s.edu_year FROM ( SELECT spm.id FROM student_pay_master spm WHERE spm.company_id = #{companyId} and spm.origin_type=0 AND spm.commodity_id = #{classTypeId} AND spm.commodity_type = 'COMMODITY_CLASS' AND ( spm.pay_status_code = 'ORDER_PAID' OR spm.pay_status_code = 'ORDER_PART_PAY' OR spm.pay_status_code = 'ORDER_FINISHED' OR spm.pay_status_code = 'ORDER_PAID_NO_COURSE' ) ) spm2, ( SELECT sps.pay_master_id, sps.resource_id FROM student_pay_slave sps WHERE sps.slave_status_code != 'SUB_ORDER_DELTED' AND ( sps.resource_type = 'TEACH_METHOD_LIVE' OR sps.resource_type = 'TEACH_METHOD_FACE' ) GROUP BY sps.resource_id ) sps2, class_module_no cmn, class_module_lesson e, company_live_static_record clsr, users_front uf, student s LEFT JOIN sys_config_dict d on d.`item_code` = s.`edu_area` LEFT JOIN sys_config_dict d1 on d1.`item_code` = s.`edu_school` LEFT JOIN sys_config_dict d2 on d2.`item_code` = s.`edu_step` WHERE sps2.pay_master_id = spm2.id AND sps2.resource_id = cmn.id AND cmn.id = e.module_no_id AND e.id = clsr.class_lesson_id AND uf.id = clsr.user_id AND s.user_id = uf.id and clsr.class_lesson_id = #{classLessionId} and (uf.mobile = '${mobile}' or uf.username like '%${mobile}%' ) and clsr.watch_type = #{watchType} and s.edu_area = #{eduArea} and s.edu_school = #{eduSchool} and s.edu_step = #{eduStep} and s.edu_year = #{eduYear} limit #{firstIndex},#{pageSize}

SELECT count(clsr.id) FROM ( SELECT spm.id FROM student_pay_master spm WHERE spm.company_id = #{companyId} and spm.origin_type=0 AND spm.commodity_id = #{classTypeId} AND spm.commodity_type = 'COMMODITY_CLASS' AND ( spm.pay_status_code = 'ORDER_PAID' OR spm.pay_status_code = 'ORDER_PART_PAY' OR spm.pay_status_code = 'ORDER_FINISHED' OR spm.pay_status_code = 'ORDER_PAID_NO_COURSE' ) ) spm2, ( SELECT sps.pay_master_id, sps.resource_id FROM student_pay_slave sps WHERE sps.slave_status_code != 'SUB_ORDER_DELTED' AND ( sps.resource_type = 'TEACH_METHOD_LIVE' OR sps.resource_type = 'TEACH_METHOD_FACE' ) GROUP BY sps.resource_id ) sps2, class_module_no cmn, class_module_lesson e, company_live_static_record clsr, users_front uf, student s WHERE sps2.pay_master_id = spm2.id AND sps2.resource_id = cmn.id AND cmn.id = e.module_no_id AND e.id = clsr.class_lesson_id AND uf.id = clsr.user_id AND s.user_id = uf.id and clsr.class_lesson_id = #{classLessionId} and (uf.mobile = '${mobile}' or uf.username like '%${mobile}%' ) and clsr.watch_type = #{watchType} and s.edu_area = #{eduArea} and s.edu_school = #{eduSchool} and s.edu_step = #{eduStep} and s.edu_year = #{eduYear}

SELECT e.id,e.lesson_name FROM class_type a INNER JOIN class_type_module_relation b ON a.id = b.class_type_id inner join class_module cm on cm.id = b.module_id INNER JOIN class_module_no cmn ON cmn.module_id = cm.id INNER JOIN class_module_lesson e ON cmn.id = e.module_no_id WHERE a.id =#{classTypeId} and a.origin_type=0 and cmn.del_flag = 0 and cmn.publish_status='MODULE_NO_ON_SALE' and e.del_flag = 0 and cm.teach_method='TEACH_METHOD_LIVE'

select clsr.live_date,clsr.in_time,clsr.out_time,clsr.watch_type,uf.mobile,uf.username,uf.nick_name,s.`name`,s.email,cml.lesson_name FROM student_pay_master spm INNER JOIN student_pay_slave sps ON sps.pay_master_id = spm.id INNER JOIN class_module_no cmn ON sps.resource_id = cmn.id INNER JOIN class_module_lesson e ON cmn.id = e.module_no_id INNER JOIN company_live_static_record clsr ON e.id = clsr.class_lesson_id INNER JOIN users_front uf ON uf.id = clsr.user_id INNER JOIN student s on s.user_id = uf.id WHERE spm.commodity_id = #{classTypeId} and spm.origin_type=0 AND spm.commodity_type = 'COMMODITY_CLASS' AND (sps.resource_type = 'TEACH_METHOD_LIVE' or sps.resource_type = 'TEACH_METHOD_FACE') and (spm.pay_status_code='ORDER_PAID' or spm.pay_status_code='ORDER_PART_PAY' or spm.pay_status_code='ORDER_FINISHED' or spm.pay_status_code='ORDER_PAID_NO_COURSE') AND sps.slave_status_code!='SUB_ORDER_DELTED' and s.name like '%${name}%' and (uf.mobile like '%${mobile}%' or uf.username like '%${mobile}%') limit #{firstIndex},#{pageSize}

select count(*) FROM student_pay_master spm INNER JOIN student_pay_slave sps ON sps.pay_master_id = spm.id INNER JOIN class_module_no cmn ON sps.resource_id = cmn.id INNER JOIN class_module_lesson e ON cmn.id = e.module_no_id INNER JOIN company_live_static_record clsr ON e.id = clsr.class_lesson_id INNER JOIN users_front uf ON uf.id = clsr.user_id INNER JOIN student s on s.user_id = uf.id WHERE spm.commodity_id = #{classTypeId} and spm.origin_type=0 AND spm.commodity_type = 'COMMODITY_CLASS' AND (sps.resource_type = 'TEACH_METHOD_LIVE' or sps.resource_type = 'TEACH_METHOD_FACE') and (spm.pay_status_code='ORDER_PAID' or spm.pay_status_code='ORDER_PART_PAY' or spm.pay_status_code='ORDER_FINISHED' or spm.pay_status_code='ORDER_PAID_NO_COURSE') AND sps.slave_status_code!='SUB_ORDER_DELTED' and s.name like '%${name}%' and (uf.mobile like '%${mobile}%' or uf.username like '%${mobile}%')

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT e.id FROM users_front uf INNER JOIN student s ON uf.id = s.user_id INNER JOIN student_pay_master spm ON spm.stu_id = s.id and spm.origin_type=0 INNER JOIN student_pay_slave sps ON sps.pay_master_id = spm.id INNER JOIN class_module_no cmn ON sps.resource_id = cmn.id INNER JOIN class_module_lesson e ON cmn.id = e.module_no_id WHERE spm.company_id = #{companyId} and s.name = '${name}' and (uf.mobile like '%${mobile}%' or uf.username like '%${mobile}%') and spm.commodity_id = #{classTypeId} AND spm.commodity_type = 'COMMODITY_CLASS' AND sps.resource_type = 'TEACH_METHOD_LIVE' AND sps.slave_status_code!='SUB_ORDER_DELTED' and (spm.pay_status_code='ORDER_PAID' or spm.pay_status_code='ORDER_PART_PAY' or spm.pay_status_code='ORDER_FINISHED' or spm.pay_status_code='ORDER_PAID_NO_COURSE') ) t
